Class QuestionAnswerHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuestionAnswerHolder

  • public class QuestionAnswerHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    QuestionAnswerHolder class connects to database and reads 20 true-false questions and 8 multiple choice questions and stores them in result sets.
    Author:
    Rustam Alashrafov, Abdykerim Erikov
